alfredsnippet.snippet:
Just wanted to say hi and introduce myself -- I'm the VP of Engineering here (I hope we'll get a chance to chat later on, but wanted to drop you a line first).

++{cursor}++  has good things to say about you, so I'm looking forward to getting to know you a bit better during the interview process. 

In the meantime, if you have questions about the interview process (or about engineering at User Interviews in general), don't hesitate to reach out.
alfredsnippet.name: candidate intro say hi
